com.giift.sdk.data

Class GiiftSQLiteAssetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.readystatesoftware.sqliteasset.SQLiteAssetHelper
        • com.giift.sdk.data.GiiftSQLiteAssetHelper

  • public class GiiftSQLiteAssetHelper
extends com.readystatesoftware.sqliteasset.SQLiteAssetHelper
    Especially, when the apk embeds the whole brand index, We rely on SQLiteAssetHelper, as it helps to pre-load easily the database file and ship it with the APK. The correct SQLiteOpenHelper should be accessed through DbHelperSelector. But generally the data should not be accessed directly from the db. It should be accessed though the GiiftProvider
    See Also:
    DbHelperSelector, GiiftProvider
